[00:00.00]Tyler Herro (Explicit) - Jack Harlow
[00:14.44]Yeah
[00:15.79]The ones that hate me the most look just like me
[00:18.35]You tell me what that means
[00:19.82]Make a slick comment and see what that brings
[00:21.53]I seen it go down we can reenact things
[00:23.91]Extreme like BMXing
[00:25.58]These boys p***y and they PMSing
[00:27.53]People in the city see the movement occurring
[00:29.28]And say "My God I wanna be in that scene"
[00:31.81]D**n right you wanna be in this scene
[00:33.27]She at the video tryna be in this scene
[00:35.32]Used to fantasize 'bout bein' this seen
[00:37.08]Seen
[00:37.41]Bluegrass girl but she got big dreams
[00:39.54]Can't touch me I got instincts
[00:41.22]Locked in the house but I'm plottin' things
[00:43.16]I brought a gang to the party with me
[00:45.09]Five white boys but they not NSYNC
[00:46.83]Yeah woo
[00:48.20]F**k what y'all think
[00:49.03]F**k everything that you say about me
[00:50.92]My dawgs like to play Madden and 2K
[00:52.76]But one thing they don't do is play about me
[00:54.83]My homeboy Tyler he play in South Beach
[00:56.63]He told me this summer he gon' fix my jumper
[00:58.65]I told Boi-1da that we might got a thumper
[01:00.52]I been tryna pop now I'm on like Shumpert
[01:02.27]Yeah yeah yeah
[01:03.55]Now they on my bumper
[01:04.75]Green room chock-full of all my comforts
[01:06.53]Hotel room like heaven on earth
[01:08.25]Got angels in my bed with some all-white covers
[01:11.50]Ace Pro Nemo Lucci and Quiiso Shloob Clay 2for
[01:14.31]And I got a few more I call my brothers
[01:16.34]I got a lot of flows and they all like butter ooh
[01:18.75]Ah
[01:19.28]You know what that means
[01:20.08]I came home nice but I'm goin' back mean
[01:22.05]I'm 'bout to globe-trot when they know a vaccine
[01:23.85]Mothaf**kers act lost but they know exactly what's goin' on
[01:26.77]Made a mil' and I don't know what to blow it on
[01:28.59]I tell the critics "Shut up" like my show is on
[01:30.69]Gave a T-shirt to her said "Throw it on"
[01:32.52]She one of many high school classmates I'm growin' on
[01:35.05]Growin' on growin' on
[01:35.97]My peers ain't poppin' they don't know what's goin' wrong
[01:38.85]Y'all well dressed
[01:39.48]But you ain't got soul and you just can't sew it on
[01:42.27]I'm tryna tell y'all boys
[01:43.61]I got a few songs I could sell y'all boys
[01:45.41]I tried it back then it was "Hell nah boy"
[01:47.39]Nah
[01:47.49]Now I'm in a box like a Kellogg's toy
[01:48.84]Like a like a ooh
[01:49.44]The ones that hate me the most look just like me
[01:51.50]Like me
[01:51.97]You tell me what that means
[01:53.50]Make a slick comment and see what that brings
[01:55.21]I seen it go down we can reenact things
[01:57.22]Let's do it
[01:57.56]Extreme like BMXing
[01:59.27]These boys p***y and they PMSing
[02:00.94]Woo
[02:01.26]People in the city see the movement occurring
[02:03.15]And say "My God I wanna be in that scene"
[02:05.07]That's right
[02:05.35]D**n right you wanna be in this scene
[02:07.02]She at the video tryna be in this scene
[02:08.84]Scene
[02:08.98]Used to fantasize 'bout bein' this seen
[02:10.91]Bluegrass girl but she got big dreams
[02:13.28]Can't touch me I got instincts
[02:14.90]Locked in the house but I'm plottin' things
[02:16.85]I brought a gang to the party with me
[02:18.77]Five white boys but they not NSYNC
[02:20.56]No they not NSYNC no they not NSYNC
[02:23.63]Word to JT no they not NSYNC
[02:25.55]Word to JT no they not NSYNC
[02:27.29]No they not NSYNC no-no
[02:29.13]No they not NSYNC oh-oh oh-oh oh-oh oh-oh
data.trans:
[ti:Tyler Herro (Explicit)]
[ar:Jack Harlow]
[al:Tyler Herro (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:14.44]//
[00:15.79]那些讨厌我的人看起来跟我很像
[00:18.35]你告诉这真正的含义
[00:19.82]写下圆滑世故的评论 看着这引发的轩然大波
[00:21.53]我看着一切每况愈下 我们可以重现往日盛况
[00:23.91]纵享极致欢乐
[00:25.58]这些家伙胆小怕事 他们满腹牢骚
[00:27.53]城里的居民看见那场运动愈演愈烈
[00:29.28]他们说着 天啊 我想去凑凑热闹
[00:31.81]没错 你争先恐后 投入其中
[00:33.27]她绞尽脑汁 想要出名
[00:35.32]曾经幻想着出现在大众的视野里
[00:37.08]被大家看见
[00:37.41]来自肯塔基州的女孩 她志向远大
[00:39.54]无法靠近我 我有直觉
[00:41.22]关在房子里 但是我暗中策划
[00:43.16]我叫上一群朋友 与我尽情狂欢
[00:45.09]五个白人男孩 但是他们不是超级男孩组合
[00:46.83]//
[00:48.20]从不在乎你的想法
[00:49.03]你对我的评价都无济于事
[00:50.92]我的兄弟喜欢玩《疯狂橄榄球》游戏
[00:52.76]但是有一点 他们不会玩弄我
[00:54.83]我的好兄弟Tyler 他在迈阿密南海滩尽情玩乐
[00:56.63]他告诉我 今年夏天 他要穿着我的套头衫招摇过市
[00:58.65]我告诉Boi-1da 我们可能制作一首大热单曲
[01:00.52]我一直想出人头地 现在我像Shumpert一样炙手可热
[01:02.27]//
[01:03.55]现在 他们不敢烦我
[01:04.75]绿色房间让我感到舒适惬意
[01:06.53]酒店房间宛如人间天堂
[01:08.25]穿着一袭白衣的模特与我共度良宵
[01:11.50]Ace Pro Nemo Lucci Quiiso Shloob 还有Clay和2forwOyNE
[01:14.31]我身边有一群我可以称之为兄弟的朋友
[01:16.34]我的flow像黄油一样丝滑
[01:18.75]//
[01:19.28]你明白我的意思
[01:20.08]我回家的时候待人友善 但是我回到这圈子里就变得尖酸刻薄
[01:22.05]当他们知道时局好转时 我要进行全球巡演
[01:23.85]这些家伙装作失魂落魄的样子 但是他们知道来龙去脉
[01:26.77]赚了百万美元可我不知道怎么花钱
[01:28.59]我叫评论家闭上嘴巴 就像我的演出拉开序幕一样
[01:30.69]给她拿一件T恤 我说 穿上吧
[01:32.52]她是我成长过程中 众多高中同学之一
[01:35.05]成长过程
[01:35.97]我的同龄人都默默无闻 他们不知道究竟出了什么问题
[01:38.85]你们衣着光鲜亮丽
[01:39.48]但是你没有灵魂 我和你道不同不相为谋
[01:42.27]我想告诉你们
[01:43.61]我有几首歌可以卖给你们
[01:45.41]想当初 我已经试过了 这根本行不通
[01:47.39]//
[01:47.49]现在盒子里装着以我的形象制作的玩偶 就像家乐氏玩具
[01:48.84]就像是 就像是
[01:49.44]那些讨厌我的人看起来跟我很像
[01:51.50]像我一样
[01:51.97]你告诉这真正的含义
[01:53.50]写下圆滑世故的评论 看着这引发的轩然大波
[01:55.21]我看着一切每况愈下 我们可以重现往日盛况
[01:57.22]让我们动手吧
[01:57.56]纵享极致欢乐
[01:59.27]这些家伙胆小怕事 他们满腹牢骚
[02:00.94]//
[02:01.26]城里的居民看见那场运动愈演愈烈
[02:03.15]他们说着 天啊 我想去凑凑热闹
[02:05.07]没错
[02:05.35]没错 你争先恐后 投入其中
[02:07.02]她绞尽脑汁 想要出名
[02:08.84]出现在现场
[02:08.98]曾经幻想着出现在大众的视野里
[02:10.91]来自肯塔基州的女孩 她志向远大
[02:13.28]无法靠近我 我有直觉
[02:14.90]关在房子里 但是我暗中策划
[02:16.85]我叫上一群朋友 与我尽情狂欢
[02:18.77]五个白人男孩 但是他们不是超级男孩组合
[02:20.56]他们不是超级男孩组合 他们不是超级男孩组合
[02:23.63]向Justin Timberlake发誓 他们不是超级男孩组合
[02:25.55]向Justin Timberlake发誓 他们不是超级男孩组合
